teaser: John Carney and Nela Richardson join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
description: John Carney and Nela Richardson join Kai Ryssdal to recap the week in business and finance.
title: Weekly Wrap: Grexit and Brexit, jobs report and stock values
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Nela Richardson from Redfin and the Wall Street Journal's John Carney. The big topics this week: the Labor Department releases its monthly jobs report, Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen comments on stock values, and the possibility of Great Britain and Greece withdrawing from the European Union and the Eurozone, respectively, continues to be debated.  

","type":"text/html"},{"type":"text/html","content":"

 

"},{"content":"

 

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: Joining Kai to talk about the week's business and economic news are Nela Richardson from Redfin and the Wall Street Journal's John Carney. The big topics this week: the Labor Department releases its monthly jobs report, Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen comments on stock values, and the possibility of Great Britain and Greece withdrawing from the European Union and the Eurozone, respectively, continues to be debated.
